dataList.content: As we approached the center of the Golden Bough's resonance, I noticed scattering piles of yellow.
With the twisting space, petals were wavering.
So the fathoms of Yi Sang's ego are over there...
<Come on, let's get in.>
Wow, di certo non mi aspettavo di ritrovarmi qui. È per via del Ramo Dorato? O sei tu, Yi Sang?
When we got there, Dongrang greeted us merrily.
How cozy... What place was this, Yi Sang?
The only place where I may breathe... That's what this was.
<...There are stacks of paper on the desk.>
Aha... Yes, you see, usually...
These are placed for visitors like us to read.
Yi Sang quietly picks up a stack. I couldn't begin to imagine what thoughts his face may have suggested as he silently read the letters on them.
A letter, I had written once... And its structure... follows that of a play's script.
It's then reasonable to assume that each actor in the play was provided with one.
If so... This may well have been a stage awaiting our arrival, rather than a simple emptiness.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Da quello che ho capito... Dovremo leggere questo copione, giusto?

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Magari Dongbeak si unirà a noi, Yi Sang.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Se Dongbaek è riuscita ad infilarsi qui... prima di morire... Haha, non saprei proprio che dire.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: In ogni caso, se l'ingresso in questo luogo si è aperto mentre era ancora in vita... La sua coscienza potrebbe essere stata trascinata qui come è successo a noi.
...For what reason did you stab Dongbaek?

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Ha esitato troppo a lungo... Che c'è, ti aspettavi le dedicassi una sorta di elogio funebre?
...The reason, I'll hear it.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: No, è solo... Lo sai già, Yi Sang. In quelle condizioni, la morte di Dongbaek era imminente... Se l'avessi lasciata stare, la sua vita si sarebbe spenta dolorosamente.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Ed è per questo che non puoi sfogarti su di me, nonostante la rabbia che ti ribolle dentro. Non avrebbe fatto quasi nessuna differenza.
This time, the fathoms of ego... might present themselves differently from the previous ones.
The fathoms of ego are places or images of someone's mind made manifest.
It releases a powerful and complex energy... It might draw in people other than the Sinners, like those deeply related to Yi Sang in this case.
...That so? To put it bluntly... It dragged in a bunch of clowns to act on stage, is that right?
Although this is merely a guess... Yes, I suppose that's about right. We'll have to do our best with our given roles.
...And if we don't?

The image displayed by the fathoms of ego will go awry... ultimately preventing our access to the Golden Bough. We must reenact the original's—in other words, Yi Sang's—actual memories as closely as possible.
Alright, I got that clear enough. So...
What the-?! I almost jumped out of my skin!
I had people who accompanied me, either by caprice, coincidence... or fate.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Che frase intrigante.

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: ...Why did you stand in front of the door like a dork?
...What did you call me? Wait... Aren't you the one that just...

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: What are you staring at my face for, like you were looking at a dead person? Why, do I look cool?
S-She's right, Gap-ryong, don't act like such a country bumpkin. Do you want your mannerisms to match your name?
...? The hell are you saying now... What is it?
(Eep, I'm just reading from the script, Mr. Heathcliff. The script...! That's just what mine says.)

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: What are you whispering like that?

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Oh, nulla, Dongbaek. Gap-ryong stava ripensando a come siamo riusciti a radunarci qui a T Corp.
That really bugs me... Oi, don't call me by that name.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Ottima intepretazione. Anche il vero Gap-ryong ci ha sempre chiesto di non chiamarlo col suo nome.
It is now your turn to speak, Sang-heo.
Ahem.
Ah... So...
As one might know, our hometown, S Corp's district, was going through a turbulent time, many things breaking and changing.

Because of daydreaming higher-ups who tell sweet-sounding words with no substance and corrupt officials squeezing the people, the public's lives and economy teetered and twisted more and more each day...
With no guarantees of arrangements between Wings or positions to apply for, researchers like us who pursued the studies of knowledge struggle to find even a simple bolt to help ourselves.
That was when Brother Young-ji brought us together.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Ah... Sono stato io ad invitare Yi Sang e Dongbaek. Siamo cresciuti nella stessa cittadina.
...Right, Brother Young-ji and Dongrang brought us together.
There, I suggested:
The Wing called T Corp. is seeing remarkable technological growth nowadays, generously backing inventions of machines and technology.
So it should be no problem at all to get any part we need; there, all the people invent for a living.
So, the like-minded ones defected to the district empty-handed, risking everything.
As everyone wished... We were free to continue our research here.
Even though we had to yield the colors in them, making it so they didn't outwardly shine.
As Meursault, or the Lega dei Nove Letterati member he played, pointed out... I couldn't see any color in this place.
Even the flower just outside the window was devoid of color, waving like a turbid blur.
In T Corp's district, having colors is a kind of privilege.
They take away colors?
Colors establish identity. There are few better ways to rob one of uniqueness than this. Isn't that right?
For sure.
...And colors are some of the few little things the poor could normally have.

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: Hey, Aneung, are you gonna keep chatting away?

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: The conference is today. Watch, I've made a vibrant amusement.

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: Look. It blows up better than before, doesn't it?
I have to wonder what is up with your obsession with explosives... I mean, fireworks, Dongbaek...

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: Here, you can't see stars in the night sky thanks to blinding lights and smokestacks filling the air. The stars were so pretty in my hometown, it was fun watching them together.

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: What's more, there's no color here. Where we were, we could at least see the colors of flowers.

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: So... I wanted to bring it back in some way.

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: Look. Even if it's all black and white, you can still see it, right?

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: Fire makes such a warm color.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Mi sento un po' in imbarazzo. Per ora non ho niente da mostrarvi.

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: Is that really something to admit so merrily?

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Haha, medicare gli animali feriti per strada mi ha portato via gran parte del tempo.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Non potevo lasciarli in quelle condizioni. Mi hanno fatto venire in mente il vitello che ho lasciato nella mia città natale.

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: It used to like you so much. I don't get what it saw in you.

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Era stato abbandonato dalla madre. Come tuti gli essere viventi, segue l'isinto di cercare un calore a cui aggrapparsi.

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: Well, by now, I guess it... has offspring?

dataList.title: Dipartimento Ricerca Alimentare di K Corp.
dataList.content: Hm, probabilmente no. Quel vitello era un maschio.

dataList.title: Technology Liberation Alliance
dataList.content: Agh... Urrgiahh...

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: Oh, bother... Here we go again.

dataList.title: Lega dei Nove Letterati
dataList.content: Gap-ryong, looks like the bar owner is here to take the tab you owe again. Why don't you go outside and greet them?
What the, those crooks... How'd they get here?
The strong resonance of the Golden Bough with Yi Sang is affecting the entire laboratory building.
They were caught up in it as well, but they have no ties to Yi Sang.
Since they weren't given any roles in the play... they'll instead try to ruin the stage. It'll only get worse as the fathoms grow unstable.
In other words, we have to be quick with moving the play's plot along.
The more time we spend fooling around like a certain complete oaf instead of reading what the script says, the more enemies will attack us.
Ishmael began to lightly limber up, cracking her joints.
So let's focus on the foes on deck for now.
